name: Xenophage: Alien BloodSport
summary:
The best fighters from around the universe battle in the ultimate tournament. Each win allows you to advance to the next round. Lose, and your homeworld is destroyed. Survival is your only option.

Flest ripping, blood sucking, claw slashing, tail whipping, karate kicking, fist ramming, body slamming, blood splurting action... Need we say more?
